title: ArticleContentItemFields
description: Additional fields specific to newspaper article content items in the Impresso project

page_nb_is.description: Array of page numbers where the article appears

nb_pages_i.description: Total number of pages the article spans

front_b.description: Whether the article appears on the front page

page_regions_plains.description: Array of page region coordinates in plain text format (x,y,width,height)

content_length_i.description: Length of the article content in characters

cc_b.description: Whether the article has reliable coordinate information

cluster_id_s.description: Text reuse cluster identifier (for text reuse analysis)

cluster_size_l.description: Size of the text reuse cluster

beg_offset_i.description: Beginning character offset for text reuse passage

end_offset_i.description: Ending character offset for text reuse passage

page_id_ss.description: Array of page identifiers where the article appears

reading_order_i.description: Reading order position of the article on the page

snippet_plain.description: Plain text snippet of the article content

rc_plains.description: Region coordinates in plain text format with page and coordinate information

lb_plain.description: Line boundaries in plain text format

pb_plain.description: Paragraph boundaries in plain text format

rb_plain.description: Region boundaries in plain text format

topics_dpfs.description: Topic distributions with confidence scores in format 'topic_id|score'

nem_offset_plain.description: Named entity mentions with character offsets in JSON format

pers_mentions.description: Array of person mentions found in the text

pers_mention_conf_dpfs.description: Person mentions with confidence scores in format 'mention|score'

loc_mentions.description: Array of location mentions found in the text

loc_mention_conf_dpfs.description: Location mentions with confidence scores in format 'mention|score'

org_mentions.description: Array of organization mentions found in the text

org_mention_conf_dpfs.description: Organization mentions with confidence scores in format 'mention|score'

loc_entities_dpfs.description: Linked location entities with confidence scores in format 'entity_id|score'

^title_txt_[a-z]{2}$.description: Title of the article in the specified language (ISO 639-1 two-letter language code)

^content_txt_[a-z]{2}$.description: Full text content of the article in the specified language (ISO 639-1 two-letter language code)
